document_data.name: Vaustal Urle
document_data.Abilities: As a highly experienced [[cleric]] of [[Helm]], Vaustal could request some of the most powerful [[Divine magic|divine]] [[spell]]s from her [[deity]].
document_data.Activities: Vaustal Urle was occasionally known to lend help to adventurers in need of her aid. However, this help was generally only given out to followers of deities similarly aligned to [[Helm]].
document_data.History: In [[1372 DR]], Vaustal Urle resided in Hillsfar, where she would aid adventurers who also worshiped deities of [[law]], like [[Helm]].
